text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
  <HEAD>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen:</HEAD>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE>
    in <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE>
    in <FORMAT>gro 8v.</FORMAT>
    von <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR> in <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>, ohngebunden <PRIZE>46. kr.</PRIZE>; gebunden in Leder und Schlotz  <PRIZE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8v.</FORMAT> ohngebunden  <PRIZE>6. Batzen;</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anfng der Geographie</TITLE> <FORMAT>8v.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8v.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>12. Batzen;</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8v.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Gesprch von den Wrmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE>  <PRIZE>8. Rappen,</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <NOTE>und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</NOTE>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":4,"explanation":"- Closed and separated the inadvertently nested BIBL entries so that each title is a sibling item (added a missing </BIBL> after “Memoires de Rochester”).
- Standardized PRICE -> PRIZE for consistency in the “Messung des Meridians Gradus” entry.
- Wrapped the introductory sentence in a HEAD element for structure.
- Moved the trailing general note outside the last BIBL and wrapped it in NOTE to keep bibliographic items clean."}

- Closed and separated the inadvertently nested BIBL entries so that each title is a sibling item (added a missing </BIBL> after “Memoires de Rochester”).
- Standardized PRICE -> PRIZE for consistency in the “Messung des Meridians Gradus” entry.
- Wrapped the introductory sentence in a HEAD element for structure.
- Moved the trailing general note outside the last BIBL and wrapped it in NOTE to keep bibliographic items clean.
